name: Hope is Green
description:
Plants were destroyed in the world as a result of industrialization polluting the world atmosphere. People try to live this way by making artificial plants and flowers to cope with this psychology. People long for the old and tell stories to their children. Then one day our character notices a greenery in his backyard. He is ready to do whatever he can to protect him.

Our character tyr to save and grow his plants. To make this you have to solve puzzles.

This game was maked in Global Game Jam 2021
